tossup_question: 33) PHYSICS  What is the name given to regions of a sound wave of low density?
bonus_MCQoptions:
W) The speed of light in a vacuum is a constant independent of reference frame
X) There is a bright spot in the shadow of a perfectly spherical object
Y) Every point on a wavefront is the source of a secondary wavefront
Z) To go from one point to another, light traverses the path for which the least time is required
bonus_answer: ANSWER: Z) To go from one point to another, light traverses the path for which the least time is required
